Package poolongprojectn7

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • poolongprojectn7.Note
  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a note that can be added to a Pattern. This is a part of the piano roll model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Note​(int octave, int noteIndex, int velocity, long durationTicks)
      Create a note object.

      • Note

        public Note​(int octave,
            int noteIndex,
            int velocity,
            long durationTicks)
        Create a note object.
        Parameters:
        octave - octave of the note (0-10)
        noteIndex - musical note index (0-11)
        velocity - velocity of the note (0-127)
        durationTicks - duration of the note expressed in ticks
